name: Recipe: Radish and Fish Stew
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Radish and Fish Stew.

value.name: Fish
value.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

value.name: Radish
value.desc: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

value.name: Salt
value.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

value.name: Radish and Fish Stew
value.desc: A meat and vegetable dish. The de-skinned radishes have gone into the pot first to cook before large hunks of fish and seasonings are added in. The whole combination is then stewed on a low flame. The large servings of food — best served with rice — give everyone present a feeling of satisfaction.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Kiminami Anna at Kiminami Restaurant</color>
